title: Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding. Description: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
OB: Currently, when attempting to display a chart with a blank key in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The expected behavior is that, even if the key is left blank in the properties file, it should still have a valid value and be externalized in the chart title.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Leave the key blank in the properties file. 2. Generate a chart and observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
